name: Praneeth Vedagiri
title: AI Full-Stack Engineer | GenAI Specialist
tagline: Architecting intelligent systems that combine LLMs, scalable backends, and production-grade AI pipelines
bio: AI Full-Stack Engineer with 1+ year of experience building production systems that combine LLMs, OCR, and scalable backend services. I specialize in designing RAG pipelines, FastAPI microservices, and optimized PostgreSQL schemas to process large document and transaction datasets across healthcare and finance domains. Currently working at Value Health Inc, I've led the development of AI-driven healthcare pipelines integrating multi-agent systems with semantic retrieval, built secure cloud-native AI solutions using AWS Textract, Bedrock, and S3, and won 1st prize in a 10-team hackathon for an innovative Resume Automation Platform. My expertise spans Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, FastAPI, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and cutting-edge AI technologies including LLMs, RAG, OCR, and NLP.
